intro:
Get the crystals!!
Play in split-screen multiplayer with 1-4 players!
30 stages! Normal and Hard difficulty!
description:
The objective is to collect the crystals located on the stage by utilizing jumps and dashes.
The stage is a 3D space with height, width, and depth. There is gravity, and the player controls their character by moving forward, backward, left, and right, and jumping to move vertically, aiming for the crystals.

Features
• Collect the crystal to clear the stage!
• 30 stages in total!
• Difficulty levels can be selected; Normal mode is relatively easy to clear, while Hard mode is extremely difficult.
• Collect coins to make crystals appear!
• Up to 4 players can play in split-screen mode!
• Use items to power up your abilities!
• Defeat enemies!
• There is a sword as a weapon!
• Use dodge actions to move around!
• Defend with a shield.

Multiplayer
• Cooperate with everyone to collect coins!
• Cooperate with everyone to defeat enemies!
• Be the first to get the crystal!
